page.title: 10PONTELAND GOLF CLUB
page.content: In 1927 two business men founded {Ponteland Golf Club.}They bought enough land to have a 9 hole course.In 1931 more land was bought to have an 18 hole course. At the start the Club house was just a wooden hut. In 1937 a new permanent Club house was built. The number of full playing members now is{500 men}and{150 ladies.}The cost of membership for men is{Â£133:00}for women is{Â£82:00. }You get the use of the course and the bar and to play in county competitions. There are{24 people employed to work at the Club and to look after the greens and the Club house. There is a golf professional who is provided with a shop and kit to teach learners. There could be a{by_pass}built through the centre of the golf course isolating the clubhouse from the course.
